SA15bsa070_u:725: 4. anyacca / ātmā nityo 'naindriyakatvāt / yathākāśo 'nindriyakatvānnitya iti bhavataḥ sthāpanā /
SA15bsa070_u:737: ākāśaścātmā ca bhinnauḥ kathamubhayoranupalabhyatvaṃ heturbhavet / iti hetusamam /
SA15bsa070_u:740: ākāśa ātmā ca pañcamahābhūtamayau kathaṃ nityāvuktau / iti kāryasamam /
SA15bsa070_u:743: ākāśaśca sarvavyāpī [tataśca] kiṃ sarvāṇi bastūnyanupalabhyāni / etadyāptisamam /
SA15bsa070_u:746: ātmā tvanaindriyakaḥ kathaṃ nityaḥ / iti avyāptisamam /
SA15bsa070_u:752: Uh 29#) iti cettadāhetuḥ / yathā śṛṅge yugapadeva jātatvānnānyonyahetuke / iti kālasamam /
SA15bsa070_u:760: 12. anyacca / prāpya iti cet, prāpterahetutvam / iti prāptisamam /
SA15bsa070_u:764: tato nitya iti bhavatpratijñā ātmā ca tadbhāvādanitya iti vaktavyaḥ,
SA15bsa070_u:765: kiñciddagdho hi kambalaḥ prāyeṇādagdhatvādadagdha ityucyate / etadviruddham /
SA15bsa070_u:778: yadi kāraṇaṃ na vidyata ātmārthasya hāniḥ / ityasaṃśayasamam /
SA15bsa070_u:785: sūtreṣu ātmano 'nupalabdhiruktā tasmāttasya nityatā jñāteti bhavataḥ [sthāpanā] /
SA15bsa070_u:788: ātmanityatve niyate sati sūtrāṇāṃ vaiṣamyānupapattiḥ / iti śrutisamam /
SA15bsa070_u:790: yadi bhavatā ekameva sūtramadhigacchatātmā nitya iti manyate /
SA15bsa070_u:792: ubhayathā pratītiriti cedekasyaivātmano nityatvānityatvaprasaṅgaḥ / iti śrutibhinnam /
SA15bsa070_u:800: yadi kiṃcitsadeva na tadānaindriyakatvaṃ hetutvena prayoktavyam /
SA15bsa070_u:801: yadi ca sadeva tadā nānaindriyakatvena tasya sattā sādhyā /
SA15bsa070_u:808: atra dūṣaṇam / yuktito nāsyātmā / bhavatā tu (#
SA15bsa070_u:809: Uh 31#) tatsadbhāvasya vikalpānmayā bhavato dūṣaṇaṃ kṛtam /
SA15bsa070_u:814: idānīntu svayaṃ bhavatā mama siddhāntaḥ prayuktaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:815: nanu kathaṃ bhavatā jñātaṃ yanmayā bhavadarthaḥ parigṛhītaḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:816: atra kāraṇaṃ vaktavyamiti cenmayā khalu pūrvamuktaṃ yatsvārthamaparigṛṇhatā bhavatā parasthāpanā parigṛhītā kathamidānīṃ punaridaṃ pṛcchyate /
SA15bsa070_u:817: kathaṃ jñātaṃ yadbhavato 'rtho maya parigṛhīta iti /
SA15bsa070_u:820: anaindriyakatvātsannevātmeti bhavatā pūrvaṃ pratijñātaṃ paścāttu dharmabāhulyena sādhitam /
SA15bsa070_u:822: tasmādbhavadarthanāhau yadi punarahaṃ kiṃcibdravīmi, [yanmayā] pūrvamuktaṃ tasmādetanna bhidyate /
SA15bsa070_u:826: yadi vidvān gambhīraṃ nyāyaṃ bhāvayatyuktena dṛṣṭāntenārthāvagamasamarthaśca syāttadā tasya vāda evaṃvidhaṃ dharmaṃ nātikrāmati /
SA15bsa070_u:831: yathā bīje sukṣetra upte mūlāṅkurāḥ samṛddhāḥ /
SA15bsa070_u:837: tasmādye ye sañjñānotpattiṃ subhāśubhavivekañcecchanti taistaireva saddharmavāda āśrayitavyaḥ /
